Plot: This second novel begins in 1940, immediately after the first book ended. Having escaped Miss Peregrineâ€™s island by the skin of their teeth, Jacob and his new friends must journey to London, the peculiar capital of the world. Along the way, they encounter new allies, a menagerie of peculiar animals, and other unexpected surprises. Complete with dozens of newly discovered (and thoroughly mesmerising) vintage photographs, this new adventure will delight readers of all ages.
Characters: Olive Abroholos Elephanta, Fiona Waters, Horace Somnusson, Millard Nullings, Jacob Portman, Emma Bloom, Alma Lefay Peregrine, Bronwyn Bruntley, Enoch O'Connor, Hugh Apiston, Claire Densmore
